frontMatter.title: Harmonic Series
frontMatter.description: Write a programme to calculate the sum of following harmonic series for a given value of n

contentHtml:
Write a programme to calculate the sum of following harmonic series for a given value of n

1 + 1/2 + 1/3 + 1/4 + ... + 1/n
markdown:
## Write a programme to calculate the sum of following harmonic series for a given value of n

```txt
1 + 1/2 + 1/3 + 1/4 + ... + 1/n
```

---
